error.networkUnstable: Network is unstable. Please try again later.
error.coverTooSmall: Image is too small. Please pick one at least 1200×675.
error.coverTooBig: Image is too large. Please choose a smaller photo.
error.coverUploadFailed: Could not upload the image. Please try again later.
error.activityLoadFailed: Failed to load events. Please try again later.
error.registrationFailed: Sign-up failed. Please try again later.
error.paymentFailed: Payment failed. Please try again later.
error.cameraUnavailable: Cannot open camera. Take a photo and upload the QR (HTTPS recommended).
error.avatarInvalid: This photo can’t be used. Please pick a clearer photo.
error.avatarUploadFailed: Avatar upload failed. Please try again later.
error.importCoverFailed: Could not import the old cover. Please upload a new cover.
error.subscriptionUnavailable: Payment isn’t available now. Please try again later or contact support.
error.stripeLinkFailed: Could not create the link. Please try again later or contact support.
error.qrScanFailed: Scan failed. Try again or upload a photo of the code.
